captionEnglish: Spectators fill O’Farrell Street to watch billowing smoke from the fires.
captionSpanish: Varios espectadores ocupan O’Farrell Street para ver las nubes de humo de los incendios.
captionChinese: 目擊者涌入 O’Farrell 大街，看著火災的滾滾濃煙。
captionFilipino: Nagdaratingan ang mga tao sa O'Farell Street para tingnan ang makapal na usok mula sa sunog.
locationEnglish: O’Farrell Street looking east toward Market Street
locationSpanish: Vista de O’Farrell Street hacia el este en dirección a Market Street
locationChinese: O’Farrell 大街，朝東望向市場街
locationFilipino: Tanaw pasilangan sa O'Farrel Street, patungo sa Market Street.

captionEnglish: The Ferry Building withstood the earthquake surprisingly well.
captionSpanish: El Ferry Building resistió al terremoto sorprendentemente bien.
captionChinese: 令人驚嘆的是，渡輪大樓經受住了地震。
captionFilipino: Nakamamangha na hindi gaanong naapektohan ng lindol ang Ferry Building.

captionEnglish: Residents fill Lafayette Park to view the massive fires engulfing the city.
captionSpanish: Los residentes ocupan Lafayette Park para ver los incendios masivos que envuelven a la ciudad.
captionChinese: 居民涌入 Lafayette 公園，去看吞沒城市的漫天大火。
captionFilipino: Nagpunta sa Lafayette Park ang mga residente para tingnan ang dambuhalang apoy na lumalamon sa lungsod.
locationEnglish: Sacramento Street and Gough Street, looking southeast
locationSpanish: Vista de Sacramento Street y Gough Street hacia el sudeste
locationChinese: Sacramento 大街和 Gough 大街，朝東南方望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw patimog-silangan sa Sacramento Street at Gough Street.

captionEnglish: Seen from Lafayette Park, a destroyed city looms in the background.
captionSpanish: Lafayette Park con la ciudad destruida de fondo.
captionChinese: 從 Lafayette 公園望去，被摧毀的城市在背景中隱約可見。
captionFilipino: Mula sa Lafayette Park, maaaninag ang isang nasirang lungsod.
locationEnglish: Lafayette Park, looking east at Gough Street
locationSpanish: Vista de Lafayette Park y Gough Street, hacia el este
locationChinese: 從 Lafayette 公園，朝東望向 Gough 大街
locationFilipino: Tanaw pasilangan sa Lafayette Park, patungo sa Gough Street

captionEnglish: The Old Mint building at 5th Street and Mission survived the fire.
captionSpanish: El Old Mint en 5th Street y Mission Street sobrevivió al incendio.
captionChinese: 位於第五大街和 Mission 大街的 Old Mint 大廈在火災中倖免於難。
captionFilipino: Nakaligtas sa apoy ang Old Mint building sa 5th Street at Mission Street.
locationEnglish: 5th Street looking southeast toward Mission Street
locationSpanish: Vista de 5th Street hacia el sudeste en dirección a Mission Street
locationChinese: 第五大街，朝東南方望向 Mission 大街
locationFilipino: Tanaw patimog-silangan sa 5th Street, patungo sa Mission Street

captionEnglish: The Rialto Building stands over the devastation on New Montgomery Street.
captionSpanish: El Rialto Building se alza sobre la devastación en New Montgomery Street.
captionChinese: Rialto 大廈矗立在 New Montgomery 大街的廢墟之上。
captionFilipino: Nakatanaw ang Rialto Building sa ganap na pagkawasak ng New Montgomery Street.
locationEnglish: New Montgomery Street and Jessie Street, looking southeast
locationSpanish: Vista de New Montgomery Street y Jessie Street hacia el sudeste
locationChinese: New Montgomery 大街和 Jessie 大街，朝東南方望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa New Montgomery Street at Jessie Street, patimog-silangan

captionEnglish: Horses maneuver carriages around huge fractures in Van Ness Avenue.
captionSpanish: Carros y caballos maniobran alrededor de grandes fracturas en Van Ness Avenue.
captionChinese: Van Ness 大道的大裂縫旁的四輪馬車。
captionFilipino: Minamaniobra ng mga kabayo ang karwahe paiwas sa mga nabasag na daanan sa Van Ness Avenue.
locationEnglish: Van Ness and Vallejo Street, looking east
locationSpanish: Vista de Van Ness Avenue y Vallejo Street hacia el este
locationChinese: Van Ness 大街和 Vallejo 大街交叉口，朝東望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa Van Ness at Vallejo Street, pasilangan

captionEnglish: The cobblestones buckled and caved in on Bluxome Street.
captionSpanish: Los adoquines se rompieron y cedieron en Bluxome Street.
captionChinese: Bluxome 大街上扭曲塌陷的鋪路石。
captionFilipino: Tumupi at bumigay ang mga cobblestone sa Bluxome Street.
locationEnglish: Bluxome Street looking southwest toward 6th Street
locationSpanish: Vista de Bluxome Street hacia el sudoeste en dirección a 6th Street
locationChinese: Bluxome 大街，朝西南方望向第六大街
locationFilipino: Tanaw patimog-silangan sa Bluxome Street, patungong 6th Street

captionEnglish: A building collapsed onto the California Street trolley tracks.
captionSpanish: Un edificio se derrumbó sobre las vías del tranvía en California Street.
captionChinese: 一棟大廈倒塌在 California 大街的電車軌道上。
captionFilipino: Gumuho ang isang gusali patungo sa daang-bakal ng California Street trolley.
locationEnglish: California Street, looking east across Kearney Street
locationSpanish: Vista de California Street hacia el este más allá de Kearney Street
locationChinese: California 大街，朝東望向 Kearny 大街
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa California Street, pasilangan at patawid ng Kearney Street

captionEnglish: Today’s high-rises dwarf the first business to open on Market after the earthquake.
captionSpanish: Los imponentes edificios de hoy empequeñecen el primer negocio que abrió en Market Street después del terremoto.
captionChinese: 與今天的商廈林立相比，震後市場街上的開張的第一個商家顯得微不足道。
captionFilipino: Higante ang mga gusali ngayon kung ikukumpara sa pinakaunang negosyong nagbukas sa Market matapos ang lindol.
locationSpanish: Vista de Market Street desde Front Street
locationChinese: 位於 Front 大街的市場街

captionEnglish: A barn housed the Mission Relief headquarters, which distributed food to survivors.
captionSpanish: Un establo funcionó como sede central de Mission Relief, donde se repartía alimento a los sobrevivientes.
captionChinese: 救援總部設在一個穀倉裡面，向倖存者分發食物。
captionFilipino: Naging Mission Relief headquarters ang isang kamalig, na nagpamahagi ng pagkain sa mga nakaligtas.
locationSpanish: Cerca de 25th Street y Guerrero Street
locationChinese: 第 25 大街和 Guerrero 大街附近
locationFilipino: Malapit sa 25th Street at Guerrero Street

captionEnglish: Lotta’s Fountain became a gathering spot for earthquake survivors.
captionSpanish: La fuente de Lotta se convirtió en un lugar de reunión para los sobrevivientes del terremoto.
captionChinese: Lotta 噴泉成為地震倖存者的聚集地。
captionFilipino: Sa Lotta's Fountain nagtipun-tipon ang mga nakaligtas sa lindol.
locationEnglish: Market Street and Kearney Street, looking north
locationSpanish: Market Street y Kearney Street hacia el norte
locationChinese: 市場街和 Kearny 大街，朝北望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa Market Street at Kearney Street, pahilaga

captionEnglish: The Flood Building survived the fires that ravaged Market Street.
captionSpanish: El Flood Building sobrevivió los incendios que devastaron Market Street.
captionChinese: Flood 大廈在這場摧毀市場街的火災中倖免於難。
captionFilipino: Nakaligtas ang Flood Building sa sunog na nagwasak sa Market Street.
locationEnglish: Market Street near Mason Street, looking east
locationSpanish: Vista de Market Street cerca de Mason Street hacia el este
locationChinese: Mason 大街附近的市場街，朝東望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa Market Street malapit sa Mason Street, pasilangan

captionEnglish: People gaze at the wreckage along the north side of Market Street.
captionSpanish: La gente contempla los escombros del lado norte de Market Street.
captionChinese: 人們看著市場街北側的殘垣斷壁。
captionFilipino: Nakatitig ang mga tao sa guho sa kahabaan ng hilagang bahagi ng Market Street.
locationEnglish: Looking west on Market at Steuart Street
locationSpanish: Vista de Market Street hacia el oeste, desde Steuart Street
locationChinese: 在 Steuart 大街，朝市場街望去
locationFilipino: Tanaw pakanluran sa Market Street sa Steuart Street

captionEnglish: A man inspects a wagon destroyed by falling debris.
captionSpanish: Un hombre inspecciona un carro destruido por la caída de escombros.
captionChinese: 一名男子檢查被高空墜物摧毀的貨車。
captionFilipino: Sinusuri ng isang lalaki ang isang naguhuang bagon.
locationEnglish: Kearny Street and Post Street, looking west on Post
locationSpanish: Kearny Street y Post Street hacia el oeste sobre Post
locationChinese: Kearny 大街和 Post 大街，朝西望向 Post 大街
locationFilipino: Tanaw sa Kearny Street at Post Street, pakanluran sa Post
